info.name: Rounded Google (+Youtube)
info.description:
<mark>THIS STYLE IS NO LONGER BEING UPDATED!</mark> It probably gets broken after some time.

This style makes the Google and Youtube sites rounder and cleaner.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.5.0
- Completely remade the code of the youtube site
- Fixed some bugs
- Added support to youtube music, studio, tv and more

v1.3.0
- Rounded ALL google sites

v1.0.0
- Release
